Description: National Commercial Bank - Saudi Arabia (known as: NCB) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since November 2014. NCB operates within the Banks sector focusing on Diversified Banks. It has companies operating across Turkey, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain and Cayman Islands. NCB is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in December 1953.
